Name: Echoed Voice
Effect: Single Target. Sound Move. This Move can be used many times in the same Round. *Add 1 Extra Die to the Damage pool of this move for each time you use it. Up to 8 Dice might be added this way. Reset this effect if the user performs another move, evasion or clash.
Description: The Pokémon yells at the void. Their echo answers. The Pokémon yells louder and louder everytime the echo talks back.
